name: NO ONE
description: NO ONE is a VR puzzle game where you have to connect the mirrors in the right order. When you succeed, you can get clues to the scene of the incident in the mirror. Become a detective and collect clues. Then the truth of the incident in the room will be revealed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 / 64-bit SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350 equivalent or better Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 7 / 64-bit SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX980 / AMD Radeon FuryX or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
